title: The High Harper
tags: how to unlock the high harper
content:
the remaining Bhaal Cultists here if you don't have Jaheira in your party. You are now free to speak with the Head Banker who was caught in the middle of this trap. He will ask for your help to get the coin that was stolen from The Counting House and he will invite you to look around and investigate the area, then he will leave.

In the Lower City Sewers

As Minsc believes that he is working with the real Jaheira, he has retreated into the dark with the clone after stealing from The Counting Ho
